thread.section_title: The NoMad Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Restaurant!
thread.title_full: Fantastic Restaurant! - Review of The NoMad Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TPB01
title: Fantastic Restaurant!
text:
The whole roasted chicken and the foie gras were just delicious. Just forget about the calories and savor every bite.
Good ambience, the service was excellent, very good sommelier. The dining room was chic, surprisingly large, yet intimate. Most importantly, the hostess seated us, a group of 4, immediately on a Friday night even though we didn't have a reservation.
